THANK YOU!!! Anyone been through this and it turned out to be nothing?
Posts.Title: Elevated liver enzymes after chemo MaryNY ItsStillMe

Posts.Content: buburuzaa wrote: I want to share some good news since I know how reading everyone else`s good news manages to cheer us up:) My mom has been on neoadjuvant chemo for 6 months for stage 4 BC, mets to sternum, we have been praying for  some good news... the last treatment with Taxotere managed to shrink the breast tumor significantly and axillary nodes are very small as well as the sternum, much smaller and very little activity! She is scheduled for a drastic masectomy in 3 weeks. Doctors are very pleased and optimistic about the surgery! There is great hope!!! Love to all! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Great news on Taxotere buburuzaa krissi

Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2012 09:53PM - edited Feb 28, 2012 11:10PM by buburuzaa My mom is in surgery now...please pray for her...all your support means so much to us. God Bless!!!
Posts.Title: Great news on Taxotere buburuzaa krissi

Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2012 09:57PM - edited Feb 28, 2012 09:57PM by buburuzaa The surgeon came by and told us that because the treatment has worked so well they will be doing a partial masectomy and will be saving her breast. 3 months ago the surgeon was talking about a drastic masectomy...They will be doing biosies during the surgery to determine if the axillary nodes need to be removed or not...we are hoping for the best...we hope this is the best for her...she is thrilled but I am a bit concerned....thanks for listening...
Posts.Title: Great news on Taxotere buburuzaa krissi

Posts.Title: My mom has metastatic BC-from stage 3 to stage 4 in 4 months.... buburuzaa 33skidoo

Posts.Content: buburuzaa wrote: I know it is my mom fighting with cancer but I feel that it is as much  my battle as it is hers. My mom was diagnosed with Stage 3b BC in Jul 2011. ER+70%; PGR~10-15%; Cerb-B2(++), Ki pozitiv~10-15%. After being treated with only Chemo in Romania expecting the breast tumor to decrease in preparation for a future masectomy (Famorubicin,Ciclofosfamida, Fluorouracil) the cancer appears to have spread to bones... We are now in Istanbul, Turkey at Anadolu undergoing investigations, waiting upon PET-CT results as well as blood results. My questions: -is it possible to have a clear CT in July and then during Chemo to have the BC spread to bones? -would she eventually be eligiable for a masectomy? I would love to have an ideea about what possible treatment is available for this type of BC. The doctors in RO were not very open to different types of treatment and every time I would ask about hormone therapy (she is ER+70%) the doc said we will see about that...now 4 months later I had to take her somewhere else because i think she was not given the right treatment...  I have been reading threads on this website day and night since July and have to say you are absolutly fantastic! Thank you for being here for all of us. Prayers to all of you! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My mom has metastatic BC-from stage 3 to stage 4 in 4 months.... buburuzaa 33skidoo

Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2012 11:53AM buburuzaa wrote: Hi everyone, I needsome help please.  My mom is stage 4 with mets to the sternum. She is currently undergoing another 4 rounds of TAXOTER & ADRAIBLASTIN & ZOMETA. Last TC was April 4th and Zometa April 9th. She is in terrible pain now and can barely get out of bed with pain to her sternum, right leg and liver she says. It hurts when she breathes and caughs or sneezes. We can`t see a doctor until tomorrow and she is alone right now because had to leave the city for a few days. She has been through pain before but never like this. Can this possioble be an effect from the Chemo?  I am totally scared and feel helpless. There is no one else to help her and she doesn`t want to call the ambulance, she says she will wait until I get back to see a doctor...any idea if this is normal?
